emuInput.TitMainTitle: Groom John Carter Robinson Jr. and bride Rosemary Manns surrounded by wedding party including Nadine Frye, Ardella Lewis, Doris Corsey, Lillian Kyle, William Douglas, Edward Stewart, Frederick Gray and another man posed in Mills home, Monticello Street
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 8, 1947, pg. 8, reads: "Pretty Marriage - A pretty marriage ceremony united Miss Rosemary Manns and John Carter [Robinson] Jr., on Jan. 26. The bridal party is pictured and included, front row: Nadine Frye, Ardella Lewis, the groom and his bride, Doris Corsey, maid of honor, and Lillian Kyle. Back row: William Douglas, [illegible] son, best man; Edward Stewart and Frederick Gray. - Harris Photo." Portion of accompanying article reads: "The home of Mr. and Mrs. J. P. Mills, Monticello Street, was the scene Jan 26 of the marriage of Miss Rosemary Manns, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Eugene Manns of South Braddock Avenue, to John Carter Robinson Jr. of Oakdene street..."
